title: Privacy email from riot Brazil
body:
I got an email today from riot Brazil, after translating the Portuguese I found it was about updates to a privacy policy. Am I the only one? Should I expect this email in English? Is it a sign from the universe? Or from Riot? Do I need to learn Portuguese now? Do I have to learn to play morde? What does this all mean?

Clearly these are important philosophical questions, I look forward to finding out what this means and how I can come to terms with the existential crisis this email has caused.

replies.body:
Hi,

Sorry about the spam - this was a mail that was accidentally sent to players in the wrong region, hence the Portuguese.  We've just posted about it [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/jZfBIYfU-email-from-riot-in-portuguese-14th-october-2015)

Cheers
Mindstar

So it's not some sort of sign from on high?
